replies.body: Unpopular opinion: **insert relatively popular opinion here**

Coming on the boards and seeing a minimum of two Irelia posts a day is becoming rather **monotonous.**
I wish they'd just nerf her so people can stop bitching already.

I think I just wish they'd nerf her Q damage to minions so she can't literally one-shot them.  It makes the Q resets very unimpressive and just tells you "You're not allowed to go near minions anymore or you die."

Her damage and everything when she lands it feels a bit high, but I think that's mainly because she's able to land it relatively easily now.  Just toning down her ability to be more mobile in a minion wave than Yasuo would probably do it.

''You're not allowed to go near minions anymore or you die'' was a thing even back on old Irelia.

But for damage, yep it is high due to bad kit design.

I don't think old Irelia would consistently kill minions from full health with just her Q though.  If she was even 5 damage off from killing the minions it would help because she wouldn't get resets off a wave that hasn't even been in combat yet.

Seriously your minions are a mode of transportation for her right now.

Trinity + Q it's enough to kill caster minion. Or if damage is needed then plus W.

But how is new one killing minions instantly? I'm watching Irelia gameplays and I don't see people one shoting minions like you said. They either need trinity or those 4 stacks + 1 auto attack minion before reset.

It's almost the same as old Irelia. The only difference is adding the magic damage which is good to not miss minions at the very low health.
